paper_abstract: We briefly survey issues in cloud computing security. The fact that data are shared with the cloud service provider is identified as the core scientific problem that separates cloud computing security from other topics in computing security. We survey three current research directions, and evaluate them in terms of a running software-as-a-service example. (C) 2013 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Cloud computing security: The scientific challenge, and a survey of solutions
